CheatEntry.AssemblerScript:
[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(HealthDec,DXHRDC.exe,F3 0F 11 83 00 00 00 00 8B 83 00 00 00 00) registersymbol(HealthDec) HealthDec: db 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
[DISABLE] HealthDec: db F3 0F 11 83 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(HealthDec)

[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(StaminaDec,DXHRDC.exe,F3 0F 11 8B 00 00 00 00 F3 0F 10 83) registersymbol(StaminaDec) StaminaDec: db 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
[DISABLE] StaminaDec: db F3 0F 11 8B 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(StaminaDec)

[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(PraxisHook,DXHRDC.exe,89 87 00 00 00 00 8B 8F 00 00 00 00) registersymbol(PraxisHook) PraxisHook: mov [edi],#5 nop nop nop nop nop
[DISABLE] PraxisHook: db 89 87 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(PraxisHook)

[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(CreditsHook,DXHRDC.exe,8B 8F 00 00 00 00 89 87 00 00 00 00) registersymbol(CreditsHook) CreditsHook: mov [edi],#100000 nop nop nop nop nop
[DISABLE] CreditsHook: db 8B 8F 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(CreditsHook)

[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(AmmoDec,DXHRDC.exe,89 8B 00 00 00 00 8B 83 00 00 00 00) registersymbol(AmmoDec) AmmoDec: db 90 90 90 90 90 90
[DISABLE] AmmoDec: db 89 8B 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(AmmoDec)

[ENABLE] aobscanmodule(EnergyDec,DXHRDC.exe,F3 0F 11 83 00 00 00 00 F3 0F 10 83) registersymbol(EnergyDec) EnergyDec: db 90 90 90 90 90 90 90 90
[DISABLE] EnergyDec: db F3 0F 11 83 00 00 00 00 unregistersymbol(EnergyDec)
